Title: Yippie Kayak
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Lakshmi Sundaram, Matt O'Brien (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (executive story editor), Phil Augusta Jackson (story editor), Tricia McAlpin (story editor), Justin Noble (story editor), David Phillips (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake, Charles and Gina get into trouble while doing last-minute Christmas shopping, Terry tries to make it through the holidays without a call from the precinct, and Amy takes part in a "Polar Swim" with Holt and Diaz.
